data.message: Facebook pls. Rply my ask,, coz rcvd from Facebook corporate office thru my email, that said i'm winning for the 2nd prize Facebook Promotion,? My ask is, this is true or another scam? Pls rply to aware somo Facebook user like this info.

replies.message: Thanks for the question, Reymer. Our team is aware of this hoax campaign. Please disregard the message and be sure not to release any personal or financial information to the sender. Thanks for checking in with us! -Sidney
